name: R.O.S.E. Online (Rush On Seven Episodes)
description:
R.O.S.E. Online (Rush On Seven Episodes) is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by TriggerSoft. It was originally released in 2005. It was published by Gravity Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play R.O.S.E. Online (Rush On Seven Episodes) on PC.
